product_name: Mountain Hardwear Dry Q. Bivy - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With fully taped seams and waterproof/breathable Dry Q. Core(TM) shell fabric, the Mountain Hardwear Dry Q. Bivy helps you stay dry when sleeping out in inclement weather across 3 seasons. Waterproof/breathable Dry Q. Core fabric, welded zipper flaps, taped seams and reversed durable water repellent zippers help keep moisture out. The Mountain Hardwear DRY Q. Bivy zips onto sleeping bags with compatible 70-in. zippers and features a drawcord hood to cinch down when the storm cranks up. Closeout.
short_description: With fully taped seams and waterproof/breathable Dry Q. Core(TM) shell fabric, the Mountain Hardwear Dry Q. Bivy helps you stay dry when sleeping out in inclement weather across 3 seasons.
